fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give a pep talk to the Army Veteran (2939). This grants them Overprotective defense if they were going to be executed, as they now have the will to withstand execution for their crimes in order to make you happy.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- May only spawn if an Army Veteran (2939) has also spawned.
- Cope, seethe, and mald as you wish.
